partitions.name: Dim_ITEM_SITE_EXTRACT_MANUFACTURER
partitions.expression:
let
            Source = Value.NativeQuery(
                #"SQL Database",
                "SELECT DISTINCT
            [ITEM_NUMBER],
            [ITEM_NUMBER] as [ITEM_NUMBER_Key]
        FROM (
            SELECT [ITEM_NUMBER] FROM [ITEM_SITE_EXTRACT]
            UNION ALL
            SELECT [ITEM_NUMBER] FROM [MANUFACTURER]
        ) AS CombinedKeys
        WHERE [ITEM_NUMBER] IS NOT NULL AND [ITEM_NUMBER] <> '''''",
                null, 
                [EnableFolding = true]
            )
        in
            Source
